sentences.sContent: A rickshaw driver looks for customers to take to The Gold Market, Shai Mahala.
sentences.sContent_eng: A rickshaw driver looks for customers to take to The Gold Market, Shai Mahala.
sentences.sCn: 夏马哈拉，人力车司机正在寻觅要搭车去黄金市场的人。

trans.tranOther: a small vehicle used in South East Asia for carrying one or two passengers. It is pulled by someone walking or riding a bicycle.
